message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to your business.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,250,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, the value this product brings is truly significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,350,000.  I believe this price reflects a fair compromise for both of us.

I understand the value of the product, but I still think $1,250,000 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,300,000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
